text: Sudden summer showers in Mudumalai Tiger Reserve area has brought in the hopes of the dried up vegetation getting renewed, thereby eliminating the chances of forest fire to a considerable level. Tourists thronging the Reserve could get to see greenery and even chances of wildlife sighting. Here a camp elephant enjoys the rain at Theppakudu camp on Wednesday.—Photo: M. Sathyamoorthy
title: Cooling off
